author: AP
title: Ventilator from old car parts? Afghan girls pursue prototype
description: The members of Afghanistan’s prize-winning girls’ robotics team say they’re on a live-saving mission — to build a ventilator from used car parts and help their war-stricken country battle the virus.
content:
On most mornings, Somaya Farooqi and four other teen-age girls pile into her dads car and head to a mechanics workshop.
They use back roads to skirt police checkpoints set up to enforce a lockdown in their city of Herat, one of Afghanistans hot spots of the … [+3153 chars]
